de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

Class KMeansLloyd<V extends NumberVector<?>,D extends Distance<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractPrimitiveDistanceBasedAlgorithm<NumberVector<?>,D,Clustering<M>>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.AbstractKMeans<V,D,KMeansModel<V>>
          • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.KMeansLloyd<V,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vector datatype
    D - distance value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, ClusteringAlgorithm<Clustering<KMeansModel<V>>>, KMeans<V,D,KMeansModel<V>>, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<V,D>, Parameterizable

    @Title(value="K-Means")
@Description(value="Finds a partitioning into k clusters.")
@Reference(authors="S. Lloyd",
           title="Least squares quantization in PCM",
           booktitle="IEEE Transactions on Information Theory 28 (2): 129\u2013137.",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/TIT.1982.1056489")
public class KMeansLloyd<V extends NumberVector<?>,D extends Distance<D>>
extends AbstractKMeans<V,D,KMeansModel<V>>
    Provides the k-means algorithm, using Lloyd-style bulk iterations.

    Reference:
    S. Lloyd
    Least squares quantization in PCM
    IEEE Transactions on Information Theory 28 (2)
    previously published as Bell Telephone Laboratories Paper
